price: خوا لە فریشتەکاندا نێردراو ھەڵدەبژێرێت ھەروەھا لە خەڵکیشدا بەڕاستی خوا بیسەر و بینایە
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
